title: If I Left
description: Jasmine's life has started to change. She feels alone and has been told that she's never going to be good enough. All Jasmine wants is to be someone else, but knows that it's never going to happen. And it gets to the point where she wants to end her life. Adam has been best friends with Jasmine for ten years. After noticing this change in her life, he gets a chance to tell her how special she really is and that her life is not a mistake. Despite having his own life, Adam does his best to be there for Jasmine and help her stay alive. Written by Ajay Joseph, If I Left, is a moving story about a boy and a girl who learn that friendship can overcome anything.
author: Ajay Joseph
